errors.E100: No internet connection. Check your wifi or mobile data.
errors.E101: Connection lost. We're trying to reconnect...
errors.E103: Can't make a call right now. Check your internet connection and try again.
errors.E200: Message could not be encrypted. Please try again.
errors.E201: Message could not be decrypted. Ask the sender to resend it.
errors.E202: Security key not found. Please verify this contact again.
errors.E300: Message not sent. We'll try again.
errors.E301: {{name}} is not online right now. Your message is saved and will be sent when {{name}} comes back online (up to 7 days).
errors.E304: This message expired after 7 days and can no longer be delivered.
errors.E400: Photo is too large. Maximum 10 MB.
errors.E401: CommEazy needs camera permission. Go to Settings to enable it.
errors.E500: Verification code is invalid or expired. Please try again.
errors.E600: There's a problem with local storage. Please restart the app.
errors.E601: Not enough storage space. Free up space on your device.
errors.invalidCode: The code is incorrect. Please check and try again.
errors.invalidPhone: This phone number is not valid. Please check the number.
errors.tooManyRequests: Too many attempts. Please wait a moment and try again.
errors.genericError: Something went wrong. Please try again.
errors.genericMessage: Please try again or contact support.

navigation_tutorial.intro_description: Long press anywhere on the screen to show the menu button. This lets you quickly go to any part of the app.

navigation_tutorial.practice_description: Long press on the grey area below until the menu button appears.

navigation_tutorial.customize_description: You can move the menu button by long pressing and dragging it. It automatically snaps to the edge of the screen.
navigation_tutorial.customize_announce: You can move the menu button by long pressing and dragging.
navigation_tutorial.customize_hint: This is helpful for left or right-handed users
navigation_tutorial.done_description: You can now long press anywhere in the app to quickly navigate. Enjoy CommEazy!
navigation_tutorial.done_announce: Tutorial complete. You're ready to use CommEazy.

voiceSettings.step1Description: Hold two fingers pressed for 1 second anywhere in the app. You'll hear a sound and see an overlay.
voiceSettings.step2Description: Say what you want to do, like "Contacts", "Call Grandma", or "Send message to Dad".
voiceSettings.step3Description: After your first command, the app keeps listening. You'll see a floating microphone. Say "stop" to end.
voiceSettings.commandsHint: Tap a command to see synonyms or add your own words
voiceSettings.resetMessage: All your custom words and adjustments will be removed.
